 Restricted version of Theorem 19.43 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1998.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 5-Jun-2018.)
statement: r19.43 $p |- ( E. x e. A ( ph \/ ps ) <-> ( E. x e. A ph \/ E. x e. A ps ) ) $.
